ctu.nengoros.comm.rosBackend.encoders.multiTermination

Interface MultiTermination

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Resettable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMultiTermination, BasicMultiTermination, SumMultiTermination

    public interface MultiTermination
extends java.io.Serializable, Resettable, java.lang.Cloneable

    This is as similar as possible to the Termination. The main difference is that this holds multiple terminations for one Node and represents one Nodes "input".

    Run of the MultiTermination is composed of two steps: run all its Terminations and sum all values on these terminations. The entire process should be transparent to the Nengo except the fact that the particular Node is responsible for running own MultiTerminations and read their values

      NUmber of values passed through multiTerminations, the same as dimensions of all child Terminations.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()

      • addTermination

        Termination addTermination()
                           throws StructuralException
        Add new weighted termination with the default weight (1). The Terminations are named as follows: first Termination is created automatically and corresponds with the name of MultiTermination (backwards compatibility). Following added Terminations are named as follows: "[MultiTermination_name]_0", "[MultiTermination_name]_1", ...
        Returns:
        new Termination with auto-generated name
        Throws:
        StructuralException

      • addTermination

        Termination addTermination(float weight)
                           throws StructuralException
        Specify the weight of this newly created Termination, if the Terminaion is multi-dimensional, weight will be applied on all dimensions.
        Parameters:
        weight - the termination can be weighter
        Returns:
        new weighted Termination with auto-generated name
        Throws:
        StructuralException

                           throws StructuralException

        Parameters:
        weights - weight matrix
        Returns:
        new weighted Termination with auto-generated name
        Throws:

      • getTerminations

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Termination> getTerminations()

      • run

        void run(float startTime,
       float endTime)
         throws SimulationException
        This supposed that all my Terminations were ran before, so this method just combines values on them to one own value. This method sets the value of TimeSeries myOutput, which can be obtained by means of getOutput() method after that.
        Parameters:
        startTime - simulation time at which running starts (s)
        endTime - simulation time at which running ends (s)
        Throws:
        SimulationException - if a problem is encountered while trying to run
